nodes.text: Lev Palik was a male Human, who worked as a sniper for the Recon team 05, a special unit of the Rebel Alliance during the First Galactic Civil War. Along with his spotter, Wren Cristol, Palik and his teammates were ordered to take up a position near to an enemy bunker during a conflict on an unknown world. When a group of allied agents were sent to attack the bunker, they rendezvoused with Palik and Cristol, to learn more about it.
